summary:
ReFleX-ENB is my personal preset of my ENB i use it contains a very well balanced shadow and lightning 
effects with realistic shadows during the day as well as in the night it doesn't use too much process but it uses quite a lot.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/qn8k92.jpg[/IMG]
ReFleX-ENB is my own personal ENB preset focused on lightning,shadow and reflections.First off you might ask yourself why you would use this and why this is different from other ENB mod's well there are a lot of other ENB mod's all containing different presets and different settings and effect's some have effects you like and some don't have or maybe some of them are even perfect for you but my ENB offers a mixture of amazing visuals while still remaining realistic.                   
                                               [youtube]VenWUuebp4A[/youtube]
ReFleX-ENB gives you a darker shadowed yet beautiful view of Skyrim it's shadows during the day is very realistic,while the night is dark but yet not too dark you would want to see Skyrim's beauty in the night but also keep true to realism well now you can,it doesn't use too much process but it uses quite a lot.My ENB offers these following features:
                                                  HIGHLY REALISTIC SHADOWS BOTH DAY AND NIGHT.
                                                  A BALANCED MIX OF COLORS.
                                                  REALISTICALLY DARKENED CAVES,FORTS ETC.
                                                  BEAUTIFUL REFLECTIONS, REFLECTING FROM THE SUN,FIRE AND ALL TYPES OF LIGHTNING SOURCES.
                                                  HIGH QUALITY BLOOM.
                                                  AMAZINGLY BEAUTIFUL SKY AND STARS.
                                                  DETAILED INDOOR LIGHTNING.
                                                  REALISTIC SUN AND WEATHER.
                                                  DETAILED GODRAYS.
author: GromHellscreamX
